name: Space Escape (Violet Fox)
description:
Try to Escape from a series of changing platforms!

--- Download the game for the best experience "Mainly the smoke effect doesn't work in web" ---

--------

(Controls)

-Space: Jump

-Ctrl:  slide

-A&D: Left&Right Movement

-R: Restart the level

-M:  Mute Sound

-ESC: to go back  to the main menu
